long_description: THOMSON Cross-Country Carbon handlebar offers a flat platform with robust construction that's comfortable on your all-day XC forays, plus it's wonderfully light on the scales. Carbon construction uses 3 different fiber types to optimize stiffness and flex for performance and comfort. Built for sturdy resilience, the handlebar uses a tailor-made resin for very high impact resistance. Ends of bar use a 1.5K weave to prevent damage to unidirectional carbon fibers within main body of handlebar, whether from an impact or shortening the handlebar. Clamping area is precisely refined to match with 31.8mm stems. THOMSON Cross-Country Carbon handlebar is 730mm wide with a flat top, though they can also be flipped over for an 8mm drop; enjoy a 6deg backsweep (no upsweep).
